DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study assesses static and dynamic cerebrovascular autoregulation daily over one week in patients with traumatic brain injury or intracranial hemorrhage to quantify the temporal profile of the autoregulatory status.
DOC.brief_title: Dynamic and Static Autoregulation After Brain Injury
DOC.criteria: Traumatic brain injury Intracranial hemorrhage Measurement of TCD were impossible Injury of the legs (if the both tigh cuffs for dynamic autoregulation could not be fixed)
